title: The Walls come tumbling down
creator_credit: William Weintraub, Pierre Lasry, Michael Rubbo, Roman Bittman and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Shows the rampant demolition of older buildings in Montreal to make way for the new glass towers that nobody seems to want. Describes the efforts of individual citizens and citizens’ groups to stem this brutal activity which goes under the name of progress.
creator_credit_for_label: William Weintraub, Pierre Lasry, Michael Rubbo, Roman Bittman and ONF | NFB
